Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory226.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryTongxunHalf.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "【kuroname】, there's good news and bad news. Which one do you want to hear first?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "By the look on your face... Forget it. We found Amberia's location. I'm sending you the coordinates now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "However, her integration level is much higher than anticipated. She's approaching 100%, which is near critical mass...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Looks like she has sensed that you are severing the connections with the sub-systems, which has caused her to become enraged.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Other Construct teams are ready for deep diving, but they can't last long without a commandant. So they'll be rotating in and out and supporting you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryTongxunHalf.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "We've got a difficult battle ahead.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you guys okay?', 3: '13'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Everything's fine.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'With you here, Commandant, our M.I.N.D.s are stable.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's rest a moment before we attack.", 3: '19'}
{3: 'The familiar Niflheim Lab extends in the space before. Amberia is in the deepest part of the lab.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}

{2: '???', 3: '"Years had come and gone... 50 years, 100 years... Finally, a brave prince heard tales of the princess. He did not fear the bodies within the brambles, and proceeded resolutely to the castle of thorns."'}

{2: '???', 3: '"The brave prince arrived at the castle\'s gate and lit a crimson flame with his sword. Thorns surged forward to attack the prince but were frozen in place, and beautiful roses bloomed from every thorn as the prince walked past."'}
{2: '???', 3: '"Thunder and lightning illuminated the tower. Each of the Prince\'s firm steps gradually dispelled the darkness from the spiral staircase."'}
{2: '???', 3: '"The prince finally arrived at the room on the top floor. He opened the door to see a beautiful princess sleeping among a bed of roses."'}
